Body:
with self.app.app_context():
    rock = Genre(name='Rock', description='rock yeah!!!')
    rock.add()
    self.pool.commit()
    pink = Artist(genre_id=rock.id, name='Pink Floyd', description='Awsome')
    pink.add()
    self.pool.commit()
    dark = Album(artist_id=pink.id, name='Dark side of the moon',
        description='Interesting')
    dark.add()
    self.pool.commit()
    rolling = Artist(genre_id=rock.id, name='Rolling Stones', description=
        'Acceptable')
    rolling.add()
    self.pool.commit()
    hits = Album(artist_id=rolling.id, name='Greatest hits', description=
        'Interesting')
    hits.add()
    self.pool.commit()
    assert 2 == Album.objects.count()
    wall = Album(artist_id=pink.id, name='The Wall', description='Interesting')
    wall.add()
    self.pool.commit()
    assert 2 == len(pink.albums)
    assert 2 == len(Artist.objects.filter_by(genre_id=rock.id)[:])
